description:
My place is close to Everything!!. You’ll love it because of the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets). The beautiful exposed brick wall is inviting and makes you feel the New York vibe. Hope you like it as much as I do. ENJOY!!

You will have access to the whole apartment

My Apartment is close to all major subway lines to 14th street
1,2,3 trains(just around the corner)
F,M train(one avenue away)
A,C,E,L trains(one avenue away)
and all other remaining subway lines are about a 5-6 minute walk to Union Square.

Its an old railroad apartment building, so the radiator sometimes makes a bit of a sound while heating up. 
If you are going to be doing some cooking, please let me know if you need other type of cooking utensils. I can provide them upon request.
Please let me know if you'll be needing the air mattress.
name: Awesome Apartment in Chelsea
review: Great location, great host, great experience!
